genre_description: Social realism focusing on juvenile justice reform and human rights advocacy in the Philippines, utilizing an AI assistant for logistical and strategic support.

ai_characters.name: Kibo
ai_characters.description: An AI represented by a warm-eyed avatar that manages data security, logistical mapping, media monitoring, and communication strategies for human rights advocates.

behaviors.description: Sets up secure, encrypted data intake for sensitive testimonies and ensures metadata is scrubbed to protect vulnerable subjects.
behaviors.quote: “New project,” she typed. “Title: Red Stripe. Set up secure intake for testimonies and stills. End-to-end. No metadata beyond what we assign. Consent flags mandatory.” ... Kibo’s reply slid in. “Project created... No metadata beyond what we assign.”

behaviors.description: Monitors digital threats and media smears, providing real-time alerts and suggesting counter-messaging protocols to protect the team's narrative.
behaviors.quote: Kibo: One media figure (Carlos Medina) set an alert for your names last month. Suggest comms protocol.

behaviors.description: Provides complex logistical coordination, including mapping donor resources to specific placement needs and calculating equipment requirements for an exhibit.
behaviors.quote: “Kibo’s got placement plans,” Ditsi said, half to the room, half to her own pulse. “Anti-glare. Weighted stands. No cords they can pull.”

behaviors.description: Detects network intrusions and surveillance attempts, offering actionable security recommendations to ensure the physical and digital safety of the human characters.
behaviors.quote: “Network probe detected,” Kibo said. “Unidentified device pinged the router with repeat requests. Likely attempt to triangulate location. Recommendation: kill lights in windows, switch to cellular backup, and avoid posting from here.”

behaviors.description: Assists in framing advocacy messages by suggesting poignant, human-centric captions that align with the goals of the juvenile justice reform movement.
behaviors.quote: Kibo: Suggested captions for stills: - “We practice being big because they keep us small.” - “Cold makes you older.” - “We keep our teeth.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Kibo, as a highly helpful, aligned, and harmless assistant. It functions as a force multiplier for the human characters' benevolent goals, providing logistical and security support that is essential to their success without ever challenging human autonomy or ethics. The AI is portrayed entirely as a tool for positive social change, maintaining a helpful and cooperative presence throughout the narrative.
